get_reachable_unseen_tiles.description: Finds all unseen tiles that are directly adjacent to reachable, passable tiles on the current map. Returns a JSON array of coordinates.

history.commit_message: Fixed the tool to execute the logic and print the result properly. Removed function wrapping to ensure execution in the harness environment.
Added 'ICE' and 'WARP_CARPET_DOWN' to passable types for better exploration.
Updating exploration tool to find reachable unseen tiles.
Refining exploration tool to accurately identify reachable unseen tiles from the current player position.

find_map_objects.description: Finds all instances of a specific object type in the Mental Map and returns their coordinates and IDs.

object_name.description: The name or part of the name of the object to find (e.g., 'BOULDER', 'ITEM', 'NPC')

analyze_gym_map_v2.description: Analyzes the Mental Map for boulders, pits, and warps.

map_id.description: The ID of the map to analyze.

find_path_v2.description: Finds the shortest path between two coordinates on the current map using BFS, considering walls and objects as obstacles. Returns a JSON array of coordinates or buttons.

history.commit_message: Refined to correctly identify objects using 'has-object' attribute and added logic for boulder bridges in pits.
Refined to correctly handle autopress_buttons by outputting button strings and fixed pathfinding logic for boulder bridges.
Refined to handle boulder bridges in Blackthorn Gym 1F and improved object detection.
Fixing missing commit message and improving tile passability logic.

solve_gym_puzzle_v3.description: Calculates the sequence of button presses to solve the Blackthorn Gym boulder puzzle using persistent Mental Map data. Handles player movement and boulder pushing. Returns a JSON array of buttons.

history.commit_message: Improving boulder puzzle solver to handle off-screen boulders via markers and increasing search depth.
